participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and nurturing, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive. My dad owns an appliance store that I do not want to inherit. My grandson's favorite type of cake is chocolate. I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow. My favorite season is duck hunting season.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, enjoys watching TV and spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors. My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer. I work in the pharmaceutical industry. I don't talk to my family anymore. I like a soft bed for my baby.

content.text: Hey there! My day is going well, thank you for asking! How is yours?
It's going great! I'm a teacher and I'm really excited for my students to arrive.
That's awesome! I'm a farmer and I'm really excited for my sunflowers to bloom.
Oh that's so cool! I love sunflowers.
Thanks! I'm really proud of them.
What's your favorite thing to do in the fall?
I love going to football games!
Me too! I'm a huge fan of the Raptors.
Oh wow! They're my favorite team too!
That's awesome! We should go to a game together sometime.
I'm free this weekend if you are.
